definition: variant of 油麥菜|油麦菜[you2 mai4 cai4]

sentences.english: Oats sown at suitable time have strong adverse-resistance, good economic character and high yield.
sentences.chinese: 適期播種的莜麥抗逆性強，經濟性狀好，產量高。

sentences.english: Water leakage of naked-oats and cushaw was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 相應對莜麥和小南瓜田進行了田間水分滲漏觀測。

sentences.english: Nake oats is a healthy food for diabetics.
sentences.chinese: 莜麥面是糖尿病療效食品。

sentences.english: The method of making naked oats bread was introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了莜麥麪包的製法。
